title: 장단점 비교
description: 장점과 단점을 논의할 때 쓰는 패턴을 연습합니다. The advantage of ~ is ..., but the downside is ... 패턴을 사용하여 자신이 잘 아는 주제에 대해 장단점을 말하며 균형 잡힌 의견 제시 연습을 합니다.
grammar_pattern: The advantage of... is..., but the downside is... / The benefit of... / The drawback of... / On the plus side..., on the minus side...
examples: The advantage of working from home is the flexibility, but the downside is the isolation.
The benefit of this approach is its simplicity.
The drawback of the plan is its high cost.
On the plus side, it's efficient; on the minus side, it's expensive.
learning_points: 균형 잡힌 장단점 분석과 객관적 평가 표현
